name: Customizer Refresh
author: Alex Mangini

sections.description:
Sometimes you need to refresh the customizer preview, and this plugin adds a simple refresh button to make it easy.

Nothing more, nothing less.
sections.installation:
• Login to your WP admin, go to Plugins and search for “Customizer Refresh” to install automatically.

  • Follow the instructions below to manually install this plugin:

  1. Download the customizer-refresh.zip file from this page.

  2. Login to WP admin, go to Plugins and upload the file to your site.

After you’ve installed this simple plugin, a refresh icon will have been added to the top of WP Admin > Appearance > Customize.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Login to your WP admin, go to Plugins and search for “Customizer Refresh” to install automatically.

  • Follow the instructions below to manually install this plugin:

  1. Download the customizer-refresh.zip file from this page.

  2. Login to WP admin, go to Plugins and upload the file to your site.

After you’ve installed this simple plugin, a refresh icon will have been added to the top of WP Admin > Appearance > Customize.

short_description: Add a button that refreshes the live preview in the WordPress Customizer.
description:
Sometimes you need to refresh the customizer preview, and this plugin adds a simple refresh button to make it easy.

Nothing more, nothing less.
